backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user preferences, profiles, C Coins balances, and purchased visual effects with CRUD operations, access-control enforcement, and blob storage mixin included.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two completed features: removing the Secret tab from the app and fixing the Click Me button in MusicTab to correctly call addCCoins and update the balance.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Colt UI' that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages global preference state (accent color, cursor, background, font, tab cloak), loads/saves preferences via React Query hooks, applies font globally, and renders all tab components except the removed Secret tab.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Canvas-based animated background component supporting six animated styles (Particle Grid, Neon Rain, Matrix Code, Starfield, Solid Dark, Cyber Hex Grid) and returning null for image-based background presets.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: Renders a custom animated cursor with multiple styles (neon dot, crosshair, ring pulse, star burst, arrow glow) that tracks mouse position with smooth interpolation and reacts to hover/click states.
frontend/src/components/effects/Firework: Canvas-based effect that spawns colorful particle fireworks at the mouse position on each click, animating them with gravity and fade-out.
frontend/src/components/effects/RainbowC: Canvas overlay that renders a rainbow-colored particle trail following the mouse cursor, with particles that fade, drift, and shrink over time.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtAstero: A canvas-based Asteroids clone with neon visuals, supporting keyboard controls for ship movement/shooting, progressive difficulty levels, lives, and score tracking.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtBreako: A canvas-based Breakout/Arkanoid clone with neon visuals, mouse and keyboard paddle control, multi-row colored bricks, lives, score, and win/lose states.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtPong.t: A Pong game component rendered on an HTML5 canvas with a player-controlled paddle (keyboard/mouse) versus a CPU opponent, featuring neon cyberpunk visuals and score tracking.
A lane-based endless racer game rendered on canvas where the player dodges colored obstacle cars across 5 lanes using keyboard or click input, with increasing speed and a best-score tracker.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtTetris: A Tetris implementation rendered on an HTML5 canvas with standard tetrominoes, ghost piece, line-clear scoring, and increasing speed, styled with a neon cyberpunk aesthetic.
frontend/src/components/games/FlappyColt: A Flappy Bird clone rendered on canvas where the player taps/presses space to flap a glowing bird through procedurally generated pipe gaps, with score and best-score display.
A classic Snake game rendered on an HTML5 canvas with a neon cyberpunk theme, interval-based movement, food spawning, collision detection, and best-score tracking.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: A reusable glassmorphism card component with optional hover effects and neon color variants (cyan, green, purple, pink).
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header displaying the Colt UI logo, tab navigation (Games, Proxy, Music, AI, Store, More), optional VIP badge, and an online status indicator.
frontend/src/components/tabs/ColtAITab.t: A chat interface tab for 'Colt AI', a study assistant that responds to user messages about Math, History, English, and Science using a local `respondToMessage` utility, with subject shortcut buttons and auto-scrolling message history.
frontend/src/components/tabs/GamesTab.ts: An arcade games tab that displays a grid of 7 available mini-games (Flappy Colt, Snake, Pong, Tetris, Breakout, Asteroids, Racer) and renders the selected game component with a back button.
frontend/src/components/tabs/MoreTab.tsx: A settings/customization tab that allows users to change accent color, cursor style, background style, font style, and tab cloak preset, persisting preferences via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/tabs/MusicTab.ts: A music search tab that queries Invidious API instances to find YouTube videos, embeds a player for the selected result, and includes a button to claim infinite C Coins via the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/tabs/ProxyTab.ts: A browser proxy tab that loads user-entered URLs in an iframe, with a compact active URL bar, quick links, loading/error states, and a clear button.
frontend/src/components/tabs/SecretTab.t: An empty file with no content.
frontend/src/components/tabs/StoreTab.ts: Renders a C Coin store UI where users can browse and purchase visual effects/badges using their C Coin balance, with items defined as a static list and purchase state managed via React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, and persisting identity state across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines all React Query hooks for backend interactions including preferences, notepad, C Coins (get/add/spend), and purchased effects (get/set).
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up CSS variables, Tailwind imports, glassmorphism styles, custom fonts, animations (glitch, neon pulse, float), and purchased-effect CSS classes like golden borders and glitch text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/coltAI.ts: Implements a keyword-based AI assistant with hardcoded Q&A datasets covering history and science topics for offline question answering.
frontend/src/utils/tabCloak.ts: Defines tab cloaking presets (Google, YouTube, Clever, etc.) and a utility function to change the browser tab title and favicon to disguise the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a cyberpunk/neon theme with custom fonts, neon colors, box shadows, animations (pulse, float, glitch), and CSS variable-based semantic color tokens.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for 'Colt UI' (version 23) describing existing features, known issues, architectural notes, and a summary of the app's cyberpunk-themed tabbed web interface with proxy, games, music, AI, and store tabs.
